projectTitle: TSCS Exams and Students Management Portal
subtitle: Comprehensive Educational Management System
description1: TSCS is a full-stack web application designed for managing civil services exam preparation at Takshashila School. The platform features comprehensive student enrollment, progress tracking, mock test administration, and a powerful administrative dashboard with real-time analytics.
description2: Built with modern technologies including Next.js and TypeScript, the system provides seamless user authentication through Clerk, efficient data management with MongoDB and Redis caching, and a responsive interface that works across all devices. The platform streamlines the entire educational workflow from student registration to exam results.

subtitle: Corporate Website & Service Portfolio
description1: Antariksh IT is a modern, responsive corporate website that showcases comprehensive IT services and solutions. The platform features dynamic content management, detailed service portfolios, client testimonials, and integrated contact systems designed to enhance business communication.
description2: Developed using Next.js and TypeScript with Tailwind CSS for styling, the website provides seamless user experience with Clerk authentication for admin access. The platform includes MongoDB for content management and features optimized performance with server-side rendering and responsive design principles.

subtitle: Centralized Job Search Platform
description1: Jobgregate is a comprehensive job search platform that aggregates listings from multiple sources, providing users with a streamlined job hunting experience. The platform features advanced filtering, real-time notifications, and personalized job recommendations.
description2: Built with modern web technologies, Jobgregate offers a responsive design that works seamlessly across all devices. The application includes user authentication, profile management, and application tracking features to enhance the job search process.
features: Real-time job aggregation from multiple sources

subtitle: Affordable Car Rentals
description1: Carko is a modern car rental platform designed to make vehicle booking simple and affordable. The application features an intuitive interface for browsing available cars, checking real-time availability, and managing bookings.
description2: The platform includes advanced features like GPS tracking, damage reporting, and automated billing. Built with Next.js and TypeScript, Carko delivers exceptional performance and type safety throughout the application.
